metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000550 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Sympa Community Sympa version prior to version 6.2.32 contains aDirectory Traversal vulnerability in wwsympa.fcgi template editing functionthat can result in Possibility to create or modify files on the serverfilesystem. This attack appear to be exploitable via HTTP GET/POST request.This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 6.2.32.

criterions.comment: sympa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
